search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Zoho WorkDrive (zoho-workdrive.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Zoho WorkDrive is [here](https://www.zoho.com/workdrive/pricing.html) .

Custom external share linksCreate multiple file links to share files with people outside your team, then label them for easy reference. Set different access permissions for each file link and track them all separately.

Password-protected links with expiration dateProtect externally shared files from unauthorized access by setting passwords and expiration dates.

File lockLock a file to prevent your teammates from overwriting the changes you make.

Follow updatesFollow important files and folders to stay up to date on all changes made by collaborators. You can choose a preferred notification setting to receive bell notifications, email notifications, or both.

Download linksDownload links are public links, i.e., anyone with the link can download the file or folder. You can set download limit and expiration date to restrict access to users.

Embed codesEasily create embed codes for files and folders stored in a Team Folder or My Folders and add them to websites and blogs. External users can view, download, and print the embedded files and folders.

Collect filesEasily request team users and external users to upload files via collection links to a particular folder. View user submissions and manage their files effortlessly.

Manage external sharing options _New_Control how team members can share files with individuals outside the team through separate settings for email, external links, download links, embed links, and the "anyone on the internet" visibility option.

Manage whitelisted domains and external users _New_Restrict file and folder sharing to only specified domains and external users, ensuring secure collaboration within approved networks.

Manage file versions_New_By managing file versions and setting limits, you can optimize team storage and unlock more space for seamless collaboration.

Password policiesTeam admins can mandate all users to set passwords when creating external share links. They can also set a strong password policy if required, making the links more secure.

Transfer ownership of files and foldersTransfer ownership of individual files and folders in the private folder of active team members at any time.

User managementAdd team members, assign roles, and suspend or remove them from your team.

Client usersAdd external users to your WorkDrive Team with limited roles and permissions. Separate client user add-on purchase is required.

Device managementTeam Admins can view and manage all of their team members' connected devices from anywhere in the world.

App access managementSet permissions for each member in your team whether they can use WorkDrive's desktop and mobile apps to access files.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   ### What is the maximum storage limit for each plan?
    
    *   For the STARTER plan, a team's storage is capped at 20 TB.
    *   For the TEAM plan, a team's storage is capped at 60 TB.
    *   For the BUSINESS plan, a team's storage is capped at 100 TB.
    
    If you require more storage, you can either top up your storage or try the [WorkDrive Enterprise plan](https://www.zoho.com/workdrive/solutions/enterprises.html), according to your needs.
    
*   ### How does the 15-day free trial work?
    
    Our 15-day trial provides you full-fledged access to all the features that are offered under Zoho WorkDrive's Business Plan. After the trial ends, you will be given an extended period of 15 days to upgrade your plan and enjoy its benefits.
    
*   ### What modes of payment do you accept?
    
    We accept payments via Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express and PayPal. For yearly subscriptions, you can also make payments through bank transfer or check transfer.
    
*   ### Do I need a credit card to sign up?
    
    No, you don't need a credit card to sign up for a 15-day free trial. Your credit card details are required only if you wish to continue or upgrade your plan after the trial period.
    
*   ### Can I change my current plan?
    
    Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan as and when you want.
    
*   ### Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
    
    Yes, you can always cancel your subscription, without any questions asked. Zoho WorkDrive's plans and pricing are very flexible and you are not bound by any commitments or contracts.
    
*   ### Is my data safe?
    
    Yes, our facilities feature stringent 24/7/365 security with video monitoring, biometric access, and other advanced monitoring systems. Our network security system employs the latest encryption as well as advanced intrusion detection and prevention technologies. Read more about our [security policies](https://www.zoho.com/security.html).
    
*   ### Where can I find your terms of service and privacy policies?
    
    Please refer to the following links for our [Terms of Service](https://www.zoho.com/terms.html) and our [Privacy Policy](https://www.zoho.com/privacy.html).
    
*   ### Have more questions?
    
    Our support team is available 24/7. Please visit our [Support Center](https://www.zoho.com/workdrive/help/), or write to us at [support@zohoworkdrive.com](mailto:support@zohoworkdrive.com).
